title: 2019 FA Cup Final
summary: The 2019 FA Cup Final was an association football match between Manchester City and Watford on 18 May 2019 at Wembley Stadium in London, England. It was the 138th FA Cup final overall and was the showpiece match of English football's primary cup competition, the Football Association Challenge Cup (FA Cup), organised by the Football Association (FA). It was Manchester City's first FA Cup final appearance since 2013, when they lost 1–0 to Wigan Athletic.  Watford were playing their second FA Cup final, the previous occasion being in 1984, when they were defeated 2–0 by Everton.
